name: Tetris (itch) (astrophics)
description:
A clone of Tetris by Ben Weeks (astrophics) 2022

** MacOS version coming soon!

Features

  • Two game modes
  • Soft and hard drop with piece outline
  • Hold piece mechanic
  • 7-bag piece randomizer
  • Some fun game statistics:
    • PPS - # pieces placed per second
    • TRT - Tetris rate (% of lines cleared that were a in a Tetris)
    • PCS - # pieces placed
  • Reeeeeally fast delayed auto scroll (DAS)
  • Best times are saved!

Menu Controls

  • UP and DOWN ARROW KEYS - move between different settings
  • LEFT and RIGHT ARROW KEYS - select individual options within a setting
  • ENTER - select a setting (does not apply to settings with options; those save automatically).

Game Controls

  • LEFT and RIGHT ARROW KEYS - move piece left and right
  • D - rotate piece clockwise
  • A - rotate piece counterclockwise
  • S - rotate piece 180 degrees
  • DOWN ARROW - soft drop
  • SPACE BAR - hard drop
  • UP ARROW - hold piece
  • R - restart game
  • ENTER - pause and unpause game
  • BACKSPACE - return to settings menu
